speed_modifier.label: Key Speed Modifier:
speed_modifier.description: If this key is held, movement/zoom/pan/scroll/etc. operations will go faster. (avoid changing, Shift and Ctrl are the only other working options and those cause various conflicts.)

line_modifier.label: Line Drawing Modifier:
line_modifier.description: When held, drawing tools will draw a line from the last point.

fixed_angle_modifier.label: Fixed Angle Modifier:
fixed_angle_modifier.description: When held, drawing tools will be constrained to a fixed angle.

pan_view_modifier.label: Pan View Modifier:
pan_view_modifier.description: When held, click and drag to pan the image view

fixed_aspect_modifier.label: Fixed Aspect Ratio Modifier:
fixed_aspect_modifier.description: When held, shape and transform tools will keep a fixed aspect ratio.

eyedropper_override_modifier.label: Color Picker Override Modifier:
eyedropper_override_modifier.description: When held, temporarily switch from the brush or fill tool to the color picker.

zoom_toggle.label: Toggle zoom:
zoom_toggle.description: Switch between close-up and zoomed out views

pan_left.label: Pan left/decrease width:
pan_left.description: Scroll the image view left, or decrease layer width in the layer transformation and text tools.

pan_right.label: Pan right/increase width:
pan_right.description: Scroll the image view right, or increase layer width in the layer transformation and text tools.

pan_up.label: Pan up/increase height:
pan_up.description: Scroll the image view up, or increase layer height in the layer transformation and text tools.

pan_down.label: Pan down/decrease height:
pan_down.description: Scroll the image view down, or decrease layer height in the layer transformation and text tools.

move_left.label: Move left:
move_left.description: Move the image generation area left, move active layer left, or view previous generated image option

move_right.label: Move right:
move_right.description: Move the image generation area right, move active layer right, or view next generated image option

move_up.label: Move up:
move_up.description: Move the image generation area up, move active layer up, or zoom in on first generated image option

move_down.label: Move down:
move_down.description: Move the image generation area down, move active layer down, or zoom to show all generated image options

select_tool_tab.label: Select tool tab:
select_tool_tab.description: Select or toggle the tool control tab

select_generator_tab.label: Select image generation tab:
select_generator_tab.description: Select or toggle the image generation tab

select_ControlNet_tab.label: Select ControlNet tab:
select_ControlNet_tab.description: Select or toggle the ControlNet tab

draw_tool_key.label: Switch to the draw tool:
draw_tool_key.description: Activate the draw tool to draw into the image.

eraser_tool_key.label: Switch to the eraser tool:
eraser_tool_key.description: Activate the eraser tool to erase image content.

filter_tool_key.label: Switch to the filter tool:
filter_tool_key.description: Activate the filter tool to apply image filters to brush strokes.

smudge_tool_key.label: Switch to the smudge tool:
smudge_tool_key.description: Activate the smudge tool to smudge image content.

clone_stamp_tool_key.label: Switch to the clone stamp tool:
clone_stamp_tool_key.description: Activate the clone stamp tool to copy image content.

eyedropper_tool_key.label: Switch to the color picker tool:
eyedropper_tool_key.description: Activate the color picker tool to change the brush color.

transform_tool_key.label: Switch to the layer transformation tool:
transform_tool_key.description: Activate the layer transformation tool to move, scale, or rotate layers.

selection_brush_tool_key.label: Switch to the selection brush tool:
selection_brush_tool_key.description: Activate the selection brush tool to mark areas for editing.

selection_fill_tool_key.label: Switch to the area selection tool:
selection_fill_tool_key.description: Activate the area selection tool to mark areas for editing.

shape_selection_tool_key.label: Switch to the shape selection tool:
shape_selection_tool_key.description: Activate the shape selection tool to mark areas for editing.

free_selection_tool_key.label: Switch to the free selection tool:
free_selection_tool_key.description: Activate the free selection tool to mark areas for editing.

fill_tool_key.label: Switch to the fill tool:
fill_tool_key.description: Activate the fill tool to fill areas with solid colors.

shape_tool_key.label: Switch to the shape drawing tool:

generation_area_tool_key.label: Switch to the image generation area selection tool:
generation_area_tool_key.description: Activate the generation area tool to pick an image area for AI image generation.

brush_tool_key.label: Switch to the brush tool:
brush_tool_key.description: Activate the brush tool to paint into the image.

brush_size_decrease.label: Decrease brush size:
brush_size_decrease.description: Decrease the size of the active brush

brush_size_increase.label: Increase brush size:
brush_size_increase.description: Increase the size of the active brush

brush_opacity_decrease.label: Decrease brush opacity:
brush_opacity_decrease.description: Decrease the opacity of the active brush

brush_opacity_increase.label: Increase brush opacity:
brush_opacity_increase.description: Increase the opacity of the active brush

brush_hardness_decrease.label: Decrease brush hardness:
brush_hardness_decrease.description: Decrease the hardness of the active brush

brush_hardness_increase.label: Increase brush hardness:
brush_hardness_increase.description: Increase the hardness of the active brush

rotate_ccw_key.label: Rotate layer counter-clockwise/text size down:
rotate_ccw_key.description: Rotates the layer when the layer transformation tool is active, or decrease font size in the text tool.

rotate_cw_key.label: Rotate layer clockwise/text size up:
rotate_cw_key.description: Rotates the layer when the layer transformation tool is active, or decrease font size in the text tool.

tool_action_hotkey.label: Tool action hotkey
tool_action_hotkey.description: Performs some context-specific action based on the active tool.

new_image_shortcut.label: New image
new_image_shortcut.description: Open a new image for editing.

save_as_shortcut.label: Save as
save_as_shortcut.description: Save current image as .png or .inpt at a new file path.

load_shortcut.label: Load image
load_shortcut.description: Open an image file for editing.

reload_shortcut.label: Reload
reload_shortcut.description: Reload the image from its file.

redo_shortcut.label: Redo
redo_shortcut.description: Re-apply the last action reversed with undo.

cut_shortcut.label: Cut
cut_shortcut.description: Remove selected image content in the active layer.

copy_shortcut.label: Copy
copy_shortcut.description: Copy selected image content in the active layer.

paste_shortcut.label: Paste
paste_shortcut.description: Insert copied image data into a new layer.

clear_shortcut.label: Clear
clear_shortcut.description: Delete selected image content in the active layer.

navigation_window_shortcut.label: Show navigation window
navigation_window_shortcut.description: Open a navigation window showing the entire edited image.

resize_canvas_shortcut.label: Resize canvas
resize_canvas_shortcut.description: Change the image size without scaling layers.

scale_image_shortcut.label: Scale image
scale_image_shortcut.description: Scale image content to a new size.

crop_image_shortcut.label: Crop image to selection
crop_image_shortcut.description: Crop the image to fit the current selected area.

crop_image_to_gen_shortcut.label: Crop image to generation area
crop_image_to_gen_shortcut.description: Crop the image to fit image generation area.

image_to_layers_shortcut.label: Resize image to content
image_to_layers_shortcut.description: Resize the image to fit all layers

update_metadata_shortcut.label: Update metadata
update_metadata_shortcut.description: Update image metadata that will be saved with the file.

select_layer_content_shortcut.label: Select layer content
select_layer_content_shortcut.description: Select all non-transparent pixels in the active layer

show_layer_menu_shortcut.label: Show layer window
show_layer_menu_shortcut.description: Open the image layer panel in a new window.

new_layer_shortcut.label: New layer
new_layer_shortcut.description: Create a new layer above the active layer.

new_layer_group_shortcut.label: New layer group
new_layer_group_shortcut.description: Create a new layer group above the active layer.

copy_layer_shortcut.label: Copy layer
copy_layer_shortcut.description: Create a copy of the active layer.

select_previous_layer_shortcut.label: Select previous layer
select_previous_layer_shortcut.description: Switch to the next layer up.

select_next_layer_shortcut.label: Select next layer
select_next_layer_shortcut.description: Switch to the next layer down.

move_layer_to_top_shortcut.label: Move layer to top
move_layer_to_top_shortcut.description: Move the active layer above all others

merge_layer_down_shortcut.label: Merge layer down
merge_layer_down_shortcut.description: Merge the active layer with the one below it

layer_to_image_size_shortcut.label: Layer to image size
layer_to_image_size_shortcut.description: Expand or crop the active layer to match the image bounds.

crop_layer_to_selection_shortcut.label: Crop layer to selection
crop_layer_to_selection_shortcut.description: Crop the layer to fit the current selected area.

crop_to_content_shortcut.label: Crop layer to contents
crop_to_content_shortcut.description: Crop transparent borders in the active layer.

layer_rotate_cw_shortcut.label: Rotate layer 90° CW
layer_rotate_cw_shortcut.description: Rotate the active layer 90 degrees clockwise.

layer_rotate_ccw_shortcut.label: Rotate layer 90° CCW
layer_rotate_ccw_shortcut.description: Rotate the active layer 90 degrees counter-clockwise.

prompt_style_shortcut.label: View saved prompt styles
prompt_style_shortcut.description: Access saved Stable Diffusion prompt styles

lcm_mode_shortcut.label: LCM mode
lcm_mode_shortcut.description: Apply appropriate settings for the LCM LoRA.
